column5: Good day,  I usually fish Fairy Lake in Huntsville, this year I have been able to find a boat in Lake Vernon but I have never fished it so any and all help would be greatly appriciated. I would like to target all 3, sm,lb and maybe some pike, as I have never even looked at htis lake any suggestions would be helpful.  We will be going up on July 19th staying the week, so a report will follow when I return, hopefully with some pictures.  Thanks in advance,  FLEX
